snippet: Fast chargers for electric vehicles are already available, but their connectors are largely incompatible. As standards wars go, the debate over which will become the industry leader is a version of the battle between Betamax and VHS.
abstract: Fast chargers for electric vehicles are available, but their connectors are largely incompatible, a factor that limits the appeal of the vehicles.
lead_paragraph: Fast chargers for electric vehicles are already available, but their connectors are largely incompatible. As standards wars go, the debate over which will become the industry leader is a version of the battle between Betamax and VHS.

headline.seo: Standards for Fast Charging Are Getting No Closer
